tuv.seg: Taxation of lump sum payment on redundancy or retirement
Cáin ar chnapshuim iomarcaíochta nó scoir
There are various circumstances in which people receive compensation for loss of employment
Tá cúinsí éagsúla lena bhfaigheann daoine cúiteamh airgid nuair a chailleann siad a gcuid fostaíochta

The most common is where you are made redundant and you get a settlement, which may include the statutory redundancy lump sum, and a further sum negotiated by you or your trade union with the employer
Don chuid is mó is íocaíocht iomarcaíochta atá i gceist, an cnapshuim iomarcaíochta dleathúla, móide, b'fhéidir suim eile a shocraíonn tú nó do cheardchumann leis an bhfostóir
When you retire you may be paid a lump sum by your employer
Nuair téann tú ar scor, d'fhéadfadh go n-íocann d'fhostóir cnapshuim leat
If you had a fixed-term contract and it is ended early, you may get a lump sum in compensation
Má bhí conradh ar feadh tréimhse faoi leith agat agus má chuirtear deireadh go luath leis, d'fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh cnapshuim curtha ar fáil duit mar chúiteamh
This document is about the taxation of your redundancy or retirement lump sum
Baineann an cháipéis seo le cánachas do chnapshuime iomarcaíochta nó scoir
It is not about the tax treatment of your pension scheme lump sum
Ní bhaineann sí le caitheamh cánach chnapshuime do scéime pinsin

If all of your lump sum is statutory redundancy, or if it is a payment made on account of injury or disability, (subject to a maximum lifetime tax-free limit of €200,000), no tax is payable and therefore the rest of this document does not apply to you

Más iomarcaíocht reachtúil do chnapshuim go léir, nó má dhéantar íocaíocht mar gheall ar ghortú nó míchumas, (faoi réir uasteorainn saoil saor ó cháin €200,000), níl aon cháin le híoc agus ní bhaineann an chuid eile den cháipéis seo leat, ar an ábhar sin
If you receive a lump sum in compensation for the loss of employment, part of it may be tax free
Má fhaigheann tú cnapshuim mar chúiteamh ar do fhostaíocht a chailliúint d'fhéadfadh sé nach mbeadh cáin le n-íoc agat ar chuid de
The following payments are tax free:
Tá na híocaíochtaí seo a leanas saor ó cháin:
• A payment made on account of death, injury or disability, (subject to a maximum lifetime tax-free limit of €200,000)
• Íocaíocht a rinneadh mar gheall ar bhás, gortú nó míchumas, (faoi réir uasteorainn saoil saor ó cháin €200,000)
• Certain payments made by employers to employees arising from employment law rights claims
• Íocaíochtaí áirithe a dhéanann fostóirí le fostaithe a eascraíonn ó éilimh ar chearta dlí fostaíochta
The following payments are not exempt from tax but may qualify for some tax relief – see ‘Tax-free entitlements’ below
Níl na híocaíochtaí a leanas díolmhaithe ó cháin ach d’fhéadfaidís cáiliú do roinnt faoiseamh cánach – féach ‘Teidlíochtaí saor ó cháin’ thíos
• A non-statutory redundancy payment, that is, the amount paid by your employer, which is over and above the statutory redundancy payment
• Íocaíocht neamhreachtúil iomarcaíochta, is é sin, an méid a d’íoc d’fhostóir, atá os cionn agus níos airde ná an íocaíocht iomarcaíochta reachtúla
This is also known as an ex-gratia payment
Tugtar íocaíocht ex-gratia air seo, chomh maith

• Payment in lieu of notice (However, if your contract of employment provides for a payment of this kind on termination of the contract, these tax-free entitlements do not apply and you pay tax and PRSI in the normal way.)
• Íocaíocht in ionad fógra (ach má fhorálann do chonradh fostaíochta d’íocaíocht den sórt seo ar fhoirceannadh an chonartha, íocann tú cáin agus ÁSPC ar an ngnáthbhealach.)
On a redundancy or retirement payment, you are entitled to one of the following tax exemption options, whichever is the higher
Nuair a fhaigheann tú íocaíocht iomarcaíochta nó scoir tá tú i dteideal an méid níos airde seo leanas a fháil:
The Basic Exemption due is €10,160, plus €765 for each complete year of service
Ní ghearrtar aon cháin ar an gcéad €10,160 sa bhreis ar sin tá €765 ar son chuile bhliain seirbhíse saor ó cháin
(This does not include statutory redundancy which is tax free.)
(Ní chuirtear an chnapshuim dleathúil san áireamh)
Basic Exemption plus Increased Exemption
Bundíolúine móide Díolúine Méadaithe
An additional €10,000 called the Increased Exemption is also available in the following certain circumstances:
Tá €10,000 méid breise, an díolúine méadaithe dá ngairtear, ar fáil faoi choinníollacha seo a leanas:
• If you haven't received a tax-free lump sum in the last 10 years and you are not getting a lump sum pension payment now or in the future
• Ní bhfuair tú cnapshuim saor ó cháin le 10 bliana anuas agus nach bhfuil cnapshuim pinsin dhá fháil agat anois nó san am atá le teacht
If you are in an occupational pension scheme, the Increased Exemption is reduced by any tax-free lump sum from the pension scheme you may be entitled to receive
Má tá scéim phinsin cheirde le fáil agat laghdófar an díolúine méadaithe den chnapshuim pinsin atá saor ó cháin
Standard Capital Superannuation Benefit (SCSB)
Sochar Caighdeánach Pinsin Chaipitil (SCSB)
This is an additional relief due that normally benefits people with higher earnings and long service
Is faoiseamh breise dlíte é. Is iondúil go bhfuil an faoiseamh seo níos fearr do dhaoine a bhfuil blianta fada seirbhíse acu agus a mbíodh tuarastal níos airde dhá fháil acu
It can be used if the following formula gives an amount greater than either basic exemption or Basic Exemption plus Increased Exemption
Má thugann an fhoirmle seo a leanas méid is mó ná Bundíolúine nó Bundíolúine móide Díolúine Méadaithe beidh an faoiseamh dlíte

Formula for SCSB: Take the average annual earnings over the previous 3 years (or the whole period of service, if less than 3 years), multiply this figure by the number of years service; divide by 15 and subtract the lump sum superannuation payment received or that may be receivable

Seo í an fhoirmle SCSB: Tóg an meánphá bliantúil le 3 bliana (nó iomlán tréimhse sheirbhíse más níos lú ná 3 bliana) agus méadaigh faoin líon blianta seirbhíse, roinn faoi 15 agus bain as iomlán an cnapshuim pinsin má íocadh é nó dá n-íocfaí é
Example: You were made redundant in 2014 after 20 years' service and received a lump sum of €100,000 which is your first lump sum
Sampla: Fágadh iomarcach tú in 2014 i ndiaidh 20 bliain i seirbhís agus fuair tú cnapshuim de €100,000 agus é ina chéad chnapshuim agat
You also got a lump sum of €20,000 from your pension scheme
Fuair tú cnapshuim de €20,000 ó do scéim pinsean chomh maith
Your pay for the last 3 years before the date of leaving work was €180,000
Ba é €180,000 an pá a bhí agat do na 3 bliana deireanacha roimh an dáta ar ar fhág tú an obair
The amount of the lump sum which is exempt from tax is the higher of the following 2 calculations:
Is é méid na cnapshuime atá díolmhaithe ó cháin ná an ceann is airde den 2 ríomhaireacht seo a leanas:
The Basic Exemption is:
Is é an Bundíolúine ná:
There is no Increased Exemption as the pension scheme lump sum of €20,000 is greater than €10,000
Níl aon Díolúine Méadaithe toisc go bhfuil an chnapshuim de €12,000 ón scéim pinsean níos mó ná €10,000
The Standard Capital Superannuation Benefit (SCSB) is:
Is é an Sochar Aoisliúntais Caipitiúil Caighdeánach (SACC) ná:
The taxable amount of your lump sum is therefore €40,000 (€100,000 - €60,000)
Is é méid na cnapshuime atá díolmhaithe ó cháin ná €40,000. (€100,000 - €60,000)
As the above example shows the SCSB tax relief of €60,000 is a higher amount of tax relief than the Basic and Increased Exemptions of €25,460
Mar a léirítear sa sampla thuas tá faoiseamh cánach an SACC de €60,000 ina fhaoiseamh cánach níos airde ná an Bhundíolúine agus an Díolúine Méadaithe de €25,460
A certain amount of your redundancy payment is tax free, as described above, and the balance will be taxed
Beidh méid áirithe den íocaíocht atá saor ó cháin agus beidh an fuílleach inchánaithe
This is taxed as part of the current year's income
Gearrtar an cháin ar an airgead mar chuid d’ioncam na bliana reatha
Previously there was a second method based on your average rate of tax for the previous 3 years
Roimhe seo bhí dara modh ann a ghearradh cáin air ag an meánráta cánach a bhí le híoc agat le 3 bhliana roimhe

This was known as Top Slicing Relief which was not available on lump sums of €200,000 or more paid on or after 1 January 2013 and was abolished for all ex-gratia lump sum payments made on or after 1 January 2014

Faoiseamh Barrscoitheadh atá air agus ní raibh sé ar fáil le haghaidh cnapshuimeanna €200,000 nó níos mó a íocadh ar nó i ndiaidh 1 Eanáir 2013 agus cuireadh deireadh iomlán leis le haghaidh cnapshuimeanna íoctha ar nó i ndiaidh 1 Eanáir 2014
The amount of your lump sum that is subject to tax is not subject to social insurance (PRSI), but the Universal Social Charge may be payable
Níl aon ÁSPC le n-íoc ar an gcuid den chnapshuim a bhfuil cáin le n-íoc air, ach d'fhéadfadh sé go mbeadh an Muirear Sóisialta Uilíoch le n-íoc air
Your employer is obliged to deduct tax from all your income
Tá sé de dhualgas ar an bhfostóir cáin a bhaint as d'ioncam ar fad
He/she may take account of the basic exemption, that is the €10,160 plus €765 for each year of service
Ní mór dó/dí an bunchóras a úsáid i.e., an €10,160 móide €765 do chuile bhliain seirbhíse
Revenue may inform the employer about the correct amount to be treated as tax free and the rate of tax to be applied to the rest
D'fhéadfadh na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim a chur in iúl don fhostóir cé mhéid atá saor ó cháin de réir na rátaí reatha agus cén ráta cánach atá i gceist don chuid eile
If this does not happen or if it is incorrect and you have paid too much tax, you should contact your regional Revenue office to claim a refund - see 'Where to apply' below

Muna dtarlaíonn seo nó má dhéantar botún agus go n-íocann tú an iomarca cánach ba chóir duit iarratas a dhéanamh chuig an oifig cánach reigiunach ar aisíocaíocht na cánach - féach 'Cá háit a dhéanfaidh mé iarratas'
You must declare the fact that you have received such a lump sum on your annual return of income to Revenue
Ní mór duit a chur in iúl ar an tuairisc bhliantúil ioncaim chuig na Coimisinéirí Ioncaim go bhfuil cnapshuim faighte agat
There is more detailed information in Revenue's leaflet Lump Sum Payments on Redundancy/Retirement
Tá tuilleadh eolais sa bhileog Cnapshuim Iomarcaíochta maidir leis Iomarcaíocht/Scor foilsithe ag an Coimisinéirí Ioncaim
Contact your regional Revenue office
Déan teagmháil le d'oifig cánach reigiunach
